instructions:
Call Summarization 2 MT

For this test, you will need to listen to information that is provided to you through the computer. We recommend using a headset or a set of quality speakers. You will then be asked a series of questions about each of the calls.

You should enter the information that the caller gives in the appropriate boxes on the computer screen. For example, you should enter the caller's first name, last name, street address, city, and/or telephone number in the boxes marked for that information. You should enter any vehicle identification number, License Plate, or Driver's License provided by the caller in the boxes marked for that information.

You may write notes about the calls in the box in the lower half of the screen labeled Notes to help you recall information about the call.

The information you record in any of the boxes on the screen will later be available to assist you in choosing the correct answer.

After each call is completed, follow the on-screen instructions to proceed to the questions about that call.

You will also need to respond to any emergency messages that appear in the bottom right corner of the screen by left clicking your mouse over the agency to be dispatched. Failing to respond to a decision-making message within 15 seconds after the message first appears will result in a lower score.

HOW TO RESPOND TO MULTIPLE-CHOICE QUESTION

With each question there will be four choices labeled A, B, C, and D. You can choose your response in one of three ways.

1. You can use your mouse to select your answers

2. You can use the up and down arrows to choose your response.

3. You can hold down the Alt key and then press either A, B, C, or D.

Press Alt+s to pause the background audio while accessing Emergency box. Press Alt+r to resume the background audio.

mcqQuestions.questionText: Based on the caller’s information, how many men were in the vehicle when it left the store’s parking lot?

options.text: This information was not indicated by the caller.

mcqQuestions.questionText: What important information did the caller say about the man who rented the movie?

options.text: The man offered to pay with a traveler’s check.
The man’s driver’s license was expired.
The man’s credit card was expired.
The man who rented the video was the driver of the pickup truck.

mcqQuestions.questionText: According to the caller, at least one of the men who came into the store to rent a movie lives on
The pickup truck was described by the caller as
The pickup truck was last seen by the caller traveling ___________ on Maple Street.

emergencyQuestions.questionText: Several children are trapped inside an abandoned car’s trunk.
Child falls from bicycle and breaks her arm.

mcqQuestions.questionText: According to the caller, her daughter is _____ years old.
The caller indicated that the daughter’s boyfriend has a car that is a
The caller stated that the neighbor who called her and told her about the party lives
The caller said the name of her daughter’s boyfriend is

options.text: her daughter had been previously arrested by the police.
her daughter had been previously cited by the police.
her daughter’s boyfriend had been previously arrested by the police.
her daughter’s boyfriend had been previously cited by the police.

emergencyQuestions.questionText: Hailstorm causes traffic-signal lights on Main Street to malfunction.
Smoke seem coming from public grammar school’s windows.

mcqQuestions.questionText: According to the caller, one of the vehicles involved in the accident is _______ in color.
The girl who remained in the back seat of the car from which the driver ran away

options.text: has a bad cut on her leg.

mcqQuestions.questionText: The caller said she was using __________ to report the accident.
According to the caller, the male driver that ran away is _________ years of age.
According to the caller, the male driver that ran away is dressed in a black __________.

emergencyQuestions.questionText: Child is choking on a toy he was playing with.
Teenager is drowning his neighbor’s barking pet dog.

captions.CS331:
WEBVTT

1
00:00:00.570 --> 00:00:01.190
Hi.

2
00:00:01.350 --> 00:00:03.710
My name is Darlene breme.

3
00:00:04.019 --> 00:00:07.400
D A R L E N E

5
00:00:08.220 --> 00:00:11.150
Breme B R E E M.

7
00:00:11.790 --> 00:00:13.490
I work at the store at

8
00:00:13.810 --> 00:00:16.250
37 22 maple

9
00:00:16.650 --> 00:00:18.980
M A P L E

10
00:00:19.320 --> 00:00:21.550
in the town of Southvale

11
00:00:22.110 --> 00:00:25.966
S O U T H V A L E.

13
00:00:26.910 --> 00:00:27.890
I'm scared.

14
00:00:28.350 --> 00:00:30.380
I've only worked here for a few days

15
00:00:30.840 --> 00:00:33.150
I'm afraid to call the owner because
he's probably

16
00:00:33.151 --> 00:00:34.940
asleep he works so hard.

17
00:00:35.370 --> 00:00:37.190
There were two guys here you know.

18
00:00:37.590 --> 00:00:39.680
They came to rent a video you know.

19
00:00:40.230 --> 00:00:41.070
They wanted to pay

20
00:00:41.071 --> 00:00:42.320
with a personal check.

21
00:00:42.690 --> 00:00:44.819
I told them my boss said I couldn't
rent

22
00:00:44.820 --> 00:00:47.180
anyone unless they had a current
driver's licence

23
00:00:47.580 --> 00:00:48.750
but they got so mad

24
00:00:48.751 --> 00:00:50.750
and the guy who wanted to rent the
video

25
00:00:50.910 --> 00:00:52.989
said he only had an expired driver's
licence

26
00:00:52.990 --> 00:00:54.830
so I rented him the movie anyway.

27
00:00:55.380 --> 00:00:57.420
But I wrote down the guy's driver's
license

28
00:00:57.421 --> 00:00:58.735
number on the movie rental slip.

29
00:00:59.600 --> 00:01:06.180
It is T 4 1 2 5 8 7 5 at least

32
00:01:06.181 --> 00:01:08.370
his address on his cheque matched
his driver's

33
00:01:08.371 --> 00:01:09.030
license.

34
00:01:09.360 --> 00:01:11.680
And I saw this on the license too.

35
00:01:11.850 --> 00:01:13.580
He lives on central Lane.

36
00:01:14.070 --> 00:01:15.470
Those guys were drunk.

37
00:01:15.960 --> 00:01:18.000
They both got into their newly
painted green

38
00:01:18.001 --> 00:01:19.860
pickup and they were heading east

39
00:01:19.861 --> 00:01:20.909
down Maple Street.

40
00:01:20.910 --> 00:01:22.400
When they left the parking lot

41
00:01:22.920 --> 00:01:25.130
their pickup has license plate
number

42
00:01:25.370 --> 00:01:28.910
3 X U V 8 8 7.

44
00:01:29.430 --> 00:01:31.260
I'm really afraid I will get in
trouble

45
00:01:31.261 --> 00:01:32.680
for renting them the movie.

46
00:01:32.940 --> 00:01:33.660
What should I do?
captions.CS333:
WEBVTT

1
00:00:00.720 --> 00:00:03.380
My name is Cecelia Maxton.

2
00:00:03.990 --> 00:00:10.960
C E C E L I A Maxton M A X T O N.

5
00:00:11.640 --> 00:00:13.790
I live in the village of Winston

6
00:00:14.250 --> 00:00:20.260
W I N S T O N at 8 5 7 6 1

9
00:00:20.261 --> 00:00:21.580
Barley

10
00:00:22.050 --> 00:00:24.320
B A R L E Y.

11
00:00:24.870 --> 00:00:26.730
Have you had any reports of
accidents near

12
00:00:26.731 --> 00:00:27.605
the power plant?

13
00:00:28.170 --> 00:00:30.240
I was driving home with my children
after their school

14
00:00:30.241 --> 00:00:32.129
play and they saw this act from the

15
00:00:32.130 --> 00:00:33.500
curb right in front of me.

16
00:00:33.870 --> 00:00:35.330
Are you sure you can hear me?

17
00:00:35.730 --> 00:00:37.980
This damn cell phone never works
right.

18
00:00:38.440 --> 00:00:38.926
Okay,

19
00:00:39.450 --> 00:00:41.430
these two cars crashed when they
were drag

20
00:00:41.431 --> 00:00:43.259
racing on the dead end street

21
00:00:43.260 --> 00:00:44.890
leading up to the old powerplant.

22
00:00:45.540 --> 00:00:47.610
The driver of the purple car has a
pretty

23
00:00:47.611 --> 00:00:48.830
bad cut on her leg.

24
00:00:49.410 --> 00:00:51.480
The driver of the other car wasn't
even

25
00:00:51.481 --> 00:00:53.800
injured because he was wearing his
seatbelt.

26
00:00:54.570 --> 00:00:55.880
I know his family

27
00:00:56.010 --> 00:00:57.930
and his one year younger than my 14

28
00:00:57.931 --> 00:00:58.820
year old daughter.

29
00:00:59.280 --> 00:01:01.260
I saw him as he ran away from the
wreck

30
00:01:01.261 --> 00:01:02.210
into the field.

31
00:01:02.730 --> 00:01:04.680
I tell you he looks a lot older

32
00:01:04.681 --> 00:01:05.489
than he really is

33
00:01:05.490 --> 00:01:06.740
and that black jacket

34
00:01:07.060 --> 00:01:08.960
but his passenger in the back seat.

35
00:01:09.090 --> 00:01:10.670
She's a really small girl

36
00:01:10.890 --> 00:01:13.250
and she really looks like she could
use some help.

37
00:01:13.710 --> 00:01:15.000
She's bleeding from her nose

38
00:01:15.001 --> 00:01:16.580
and she's screaming for help.

39
00:01:17.070 --> 00:01:19.160
Maybe you can hear her in the
background.

40
00:01:19.650 --> 00:01:20.540
Never mind.

41
00:01:20.610 --> 00:01:22.710
Oh yeah I can see the license

42
00:01:22.711 --> 00:01:24.980
plate of the car in which the kid
cut her leg

43
00:01:25.200 --> 00:01:28.692
and it is 7 5 9 J U E.

45
00:01:29.460 --> 00:01:31.380
These damn kids are always in a
hurry to get

46
00:01:31.381 --> 00:01:33.450
someplace and never seem to be
concentrating

47
00:01:33.451 --> 00:01:34.824
on their driving like they should
be.

48
00:01:34.825 --> 00:01:36.900
You can call me back

49
00:01:36.901 --> 00:01:40.640
at 8 4 9 7 2 6 1

51
00:01:40.740 --> 00:01:42.690
if you need to get a hold of me in
the next half

52
00:01:42.691 --> 00:01:44.189
hour please hurry

53
00:01:44.190 --> 00:01:45.450
and send someone quick.
